title: How to reduce noise in Premiere Pro - Quora

response.answer_text: There is a DeNoise and DeHummer tool in Premiere Pro (under Audio Effects, Noise Reduction/Restoration). That said, if you have the full Creative Suite you may be better off taking your audio into Adobe Audition, which has slightly better tools to make changes like this. Just right-click your audio clip in your timeline and select “Edit Clip in Adobe Audition”.

You need to provide details for us to help you. What kind of noise? Is it in the original recording? Is it an intermittent or continuous sound? What is the video/audio codec? There are various ways to fix audio problems in Premiere but we have to know specifically what that ‘noise’ is.
